title.narrative: SECURITY FROM VIOLENCE AND EXPLOITATION: SEXUAL AND GENDER-BASED VIOLENCE

description.narrative: Provide and seek improved provision of support to known SGBV survivors in 95 refugee operations, 10 situations where UNHCR is operationally involved with IDPs, and 3 returnee situations.

description.narrative: Provide and seek improved provision of support to known SGBV survivors in 95 refugee operations, 10 situations where UNHCR is operationally involved with IDPs, and 3 returnee situations.

title.narrative: SECURITY FROM VIOLENCE AND EXPLOITATION: SEXUAL AND GENDER-BASED VIOLENCE 2

description.narrative: Seek improved community involvement in SGBV prevention and protection of survivors in 58 refugee situations, 8 situations where UNHCR is operationally involved with IDPs, and 4 returnee situations.

description.narrative: Seek to increase the non-discriminatory access to national child protection and social services in 44 refugee situations, 4 situations where UNHCR is operationally involved with IDPs, and 3 returnee situations.
